comments:
Recursive navigation through association ends throws NPE in case that at least one end in the navigation path (except for the last) is undefined. This means has multiplicity 0..1 and returns null.

Reproducible with example model: org.eclipse.emf.examples.extlibrary
context: org.eclipse.emf.examples.extlibrary.Employee
ocl-expression-body: self.manager.manager


Stack trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException

	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.internal.impl.AssociationEndCallExpImpl.accept(AssociationEndCallExpImpl.java:87)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.query.internal.impl.QueryImpl.evaluate(QueryImpl.java:232)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.helper.OclHelper.evaluate(OclHelper.java:183)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.examples.interpreter.console.OclConsolePage.evaluate(OclConsolePage.java:205)

Created an attachment (id=32140)
multi project patch

multi project patch for org.eclipse.emf.ocl & org.eclipse.emf.ocl.tests

Committed the fix.  Commit comment:
